Blaion Community
We are a new community in Lineage 2, we have a private system in the Source and official platform and customized by our developers. The Server is based on Low.


Welcome
Thanks for joining the Blaion Freya server. Post any suggestion or idea in the section of suggestions in the forum. We will review and answer as soon as possible.


Administrators
The Project Managers are very committed people since they all want to develop something very nice for all the players.


Questions
If you have questions, queries, suggestions or other useful things for the Server it is best to occupy the Forum tool: foro.blaion.com

Enjoy our Community Blaion and Remember Vote Every Day!
